name: 's Wallpaper App.
summary:
This wallpaper application program collects the illustration by "LLO".
moedroid.jp is Japanese MOE apps revue site.
This wallpaper application program collects the illustration by illustrator's "LLO".
All the illustrations to allow me to use it for the application program are lowering of the book only of this application program.
The finished version illustration and the line drawing illustration are collected as a wallpaper.
-- Character introduction
Her name is "HONDA SUMAKO".
It fights to defend the peace of the smart phone field today.
-- How to use
The wallpaper is selected from the menu displayed by a home screen long push after the application program is installed, and it uses it from '"LLO" Wallpaper'.
